metadata.title: USN-4913-1 -- Underscore vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Underscore incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to inject arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4913-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libjs-underscore - 1.4.4-2ubuntu1+esm1 node-underscore - 1.4.4-2ubuntu1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
